com.netflix.governator.guice.annotations

Annotation Type GovernatorConfiguration


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
@Bootstrap(bootstrap=GovernatorBootstrap.class)
public @interface GovernatorConfiguration
    Governator configuration for the main bootstrap class with 'good' default

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.Class<? extends PostInjectorAction>[] actions
      Actions to perform after the injector is created
      boolean enableAutoBindSingleton
      Turn on class path scanning for @AutoBindSingleton
      LifecycleInjectorMode mode
      Simulated child injectors is the prefered mode but can be changed here back to REAL_CHILD_INJECTORS.
      Stage stage
      Change the Stage for the main injector.
      java.lang.Class<? extends ModuleTransformer>[] transformers
      ModuleTransform operations to perform on the final list of modules

    • Element Detail

      • enableAutoBindSingleton

        public abstract boolean enableAutoBindSingleton
        Turn on class path scanning for @AutoBindSingleton
        Returns:
        Default:
        false

      • stage

        public abstract Stage stage
        Change the Stage for the main injector. By default we use DEVELOPMENT stage is it provides the most deterministic behavior for transitive lazy singleton instantiation.
        Returns:
        Default:
        <error>

      • mode

        public abstract LifecycleInjectorMode mode
        Simulated child injectors is the prefered mode but can be changed here back to REAL_CHILD_INJECTORS.
        Returns:
        Default:
        com.netflix.governator.guice.LifecycleInjectorMode.SIMULATED_CHILD_INJECTORS

      • actions

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends PostInjectorAction>[] actions
        Actions to perform after the injector is created
        Returns:
        Default:
        {}

      • transformers

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ModuleTransformer>[] transformers
        ModuleTransform operations to perform on the final list of modules
        Returns:
        Default:
        {}
